entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 27.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
